author: Unicorns in Tech | The LGBTIQ+ Tech Community
title: UITHACK24 | The LGBTIQ+ Hackathon, WeWork - Warschauer Platz - Private BÃ¼roflÃ¤chen und Coworking, Berlin, 12 April to 13 April
text:
Advertisement UITHACK24 is a hackathon for the LGBTIQ+ Tech community to come together and prototype solutions for an issue we face within our community.
About this Event
Unicorns in Tech is the LGBTIQ+ Tech Community, and our hackathon is all about bringing our community together to create a solution for an issue we face.
There are no tickets for this event, to read more about the hackathon and apply to participate, go to
Application Phase Applications are now open and will close in mid-March! We are looking for 70 Unicorns, each with their own expertise â€“ marketing, UX/UI, software developers, engineers, data analysts, everyone! So if you are ready to invest your skills into giving back to the community, apply to participate here.
Day1: Friday 12th April 18:00 Check-in
18:30 Welcome to UITHACK24
19:15 Speed Networking & Warm Up
20:00 The Challenge & Specs of UITHACK24
20:20 Pitching, Networking, Team Formation (Teams of 4-6 people) & Registration of Team Names
22:00 Time to wrap things up and for everyone to head home to get some rest!
Day 2: Saturday 13th April 07:30 Doors Open, Breakfast available & Networking
08:00 Welcome to UITHACK24 Day 2
08:15 Hacking starts
20:00 End of Hacking. Thank you for all your hard work! Itâ€™s time to present your work!
21:30 Juryâ€™s Vote
Does this have business value? Will it make an impact? Is it realistic? Have the team innovated to build this product? 21:45 Winner Announcement & Prizes ðŸ¥‡ðŸ¥ˆðŸ¥‰
Important Info: Free Food & Drinks will be available on both days; the food will be primarily vegan.
On the 13th, mentors will be available throughout the day to provide guidance.
You will need to bring your own computer, paper & pens.
ABOUT US UNICORNS IN TECH is the tech community for LGBTIQ+ & straight allies, founded in 2014 in Berlin. We connect 4000+ techies from all backgrounds, whether they're industry professionals or casual enthusiasts. On a monthly basis, we bring our community together around networking events, get-togethers and summit hosted by partnering companies.
Website :: Become a Unicorns in Tech member
Follow us on Instagram, Facebook & LinkedIn for event updates.
